title: MAC "Trying to reconnect"
body:
Since i got a new connection, i had a problem , 9/10 times i log in there i have a trying to reconnect message and i can wait all the day but no can do,  just have to close and reopen, i tried running the hextech repair tool, no can do. 
WTF IS HAPPENING RITO

replies.body: You mentioned having a new connection, so first things first let's make sure you've got those [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) properly set up. Run through the steps in that guide, and if that's not seeming to help go ahead and run a quick traceroute to the EUW server at 185.40.65.1 using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and post the results here for me to take a look!
